channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Taylor Momsen Rocks New Version of ‘Grinch’ Song ‘Where Are You Christmas?’
item.description: 🎤 Taylor Momsen gives 'Where Are You Christmas?' a rockin' twist! Get ready to hear this holiday classic in a whole new way! 🎸🎄 #RockOn #ChristmasMusic

item.title: Ozzy Osbourne’s Grandson Recreates Bat-Biting Moment for Halloween
item.description: 🦇🎃 Rocking the family legacy! Ozzy Osbourne’s grandson channels the infamous bat-biting moment for Halloween fun! #RockOn #LegacyContinues 🤘

item.title: Happy Halloween – here’s Lankum’s haunting cover of The Specials’ ‘Ghost Town’
item.description: 👻🎶 Unleash the spooky vibes with Lankum's haunting take on The Specials' 'Ghost Town'! 🕷️ #HappyHalloween #MusicMagic

item.title: Magdalena Bay Share Two More New Songs, “Unoriginal” & “Black-Eyed Susan Climb,” And Halloween Makeup Tutorial
item.description: 🎶 Double the tunes, double the fun! @MagdalenaBay just dropped "Unoriginal" & "Black-Eyed Susan Climb" along with a Halloween makeup tutorial. Check it out! 🎃🎶 #NewMusicAlert

item.title: Foo Fighters Rock the Round With Rousing ‘All My Life’
item.description: 🎸 Jammin' with the Foo! 🤘 Rock out to 'All My Life' in the round — energy levels through the roof! #FooFighters #RockOn
